lead_paragraph: The terrorist group Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb released a video of a Swiss nun who had been kidnapped in northern Mali.
snippet: The terrorist group Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb released a video of a Swiss nun who had been kidnapped in northern Mali.

headline.main: Mali: Video Is Released of Swiss Captive
headline.print_headline: Africa; Mali: Video of Swiss Captive Is Released

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb

abstract: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb releases video outlining release conditions of Swiss nun Beatrice Stockly, who had been kidnapped in Mali; demands include release of members who are jailed in Mali.
